com.netflix.curator.framework
Interface CuratorFramework

All Superinterfaces:
Closeable
All Known Implementing Classes:
CuratorFrameworkImpl, NonNamespaceFacade
public interface CuratorFramework
extends Closeable

Zookeeper framework-style client
